Header: Texas governor says Houston recovery a 'multi-year project'
Content: Texas Governor Greg Abbott has said that Houston's recovery from Hurricane Harvey flooding will be a "multi-year project". He said that this is going to be a massive, massive clean-up process. President Donald Trump is to propose an initial 5.9 billion dollars for recovery efforts, but the Texas authorities say the state might need more than 125 billion dollars. More than 40 people have died in the storm and its aftermath.
